name: General J. Hamm Naval Base
abilities: This asset generates +4 command when it generates command.

name: Vulcan Palisade
abilities: Spacecraft in low-orbit cannot be attacked by spacecraft in high-orbit.

name: Space Elevator
abilities: Constructed spacecraft may start in high-orbit

name: Nuclear Missile Silo
abilities: Spend 2 Command: Make an attack on a ship in orbit using 4 as the attack power.

name: Air-gapped systems
abilities: Espionage events affecting this asset cost 2 more intel to play.

name: Experimental Quantum Transmitter
abilities: If Experimental Quantum Receiver is installed on another asset then both this asset and the other asset receive +1 to all resource generation.

name: Experimental Quantum Receiver
abilities: If Experimental Quantum Transmitter is installed on another asset then both this asset and the other asset receive +1 to all resource generation.

name: Interplanetary Catapult Launcher
abilities: Your spacecraft in orbit around this asset only spend half the delta-vee to move to another asset.

name: Interplanetary Catapult Receiver
abilities: Spacecraft moving to this asset only spend half the delta-vee to do so.

name: Modular Construction Yards
abilities: This asset generates +4 construction when it generates construction

name: Interplanetary Broadcast Station
